summary: Comprehensive testing of Leviathan ship class implementation completed. All features working correctly - lobby selection, game launch, HUD display, stats, abilities, and visual design.
passed_tests: Backend /api/ health endpoint returns 'Warp Battle Server Online'
Backend /api/rooms endpoint returns array
Leviathan ship class appears in lobby with correct info
Leviathan shows 'Bio-Organic' role in lobby card
Leviathan shows 'BIO-REGEN' passive in lobby card
Leviathan shows all 4 abilities: Q (Bio-Stasis), W (Spore Cloud), E (Mutalisks), R (Bile Swell)
Leviathan can be selected in lobby
Leviathan can be launched into game
Leviathan HUD shows BIO-REGEN passive indicator with 'HEAL/5s'
Leviathan HUD shows correct stats: Hull 180, Shields 120, Energy 120
Leviathan HUD shows all 4 abilities: Q (STASIS), W (SPORES), E (MUTALISKS), R (BILE)
Leviathan ship has organic/alien visual design (spheres, cylinders instead of boxes)
All three ship classes (Vanguard, Dreadnought, Leviathan) are selectable in lobby
Vanguard stats correct: Hull 100, Shields 100, Energy 100
Dreadnought stats correct: Hull 150, Shields 200, Energy 100
Leviathan stats correct: Hull 180, Shields 120, Energy 120
SporeCloud class properly defined with correct radius and duration
Mutalisk class properly defined with no visible health bars (per user requirement)
Leviathan ability constants defined correctly (Bio-Stasis, Spore Cloud, Mutalisks, Bile Swell, Bio-Regen)
WebSocket connection works correctly for Leviathan ship class

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All lobby and game UI tests passed)

seed_data_creation: None required - game uses WebSocket for real-time state
context_for_next_testing_agent: Leviathan ship class fully tested. All 3 ship classes (Vanguard, Dreadnought, Leviathan) working in lobby. Leviathan has organic visual design. Mutalisks don't show health bars per user requirement. Bio-Regen passive heals after 5s without damage. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_leviathan.py covers game_engine constants and classes.

leviathan_visual.organic_design: Uses spheres and cylinders instead of boxes
leviathan_visual.special_styling: Leviathan card and HUD have special 'leviathan' class for greenish tint
